misalignments.reasoning: Statistics Bar with total tasks count, completed tasks count, and completion percentage is completely missing from dashboard
Session cookie 7-day expiry not implemented - session expiresAt is set to current timestamp with no future date calculation
Server-side password validation (minimum 6 characters) not enforced - validatePassword imported but never called in register endpoint
Client-side email format validation missing on login page - no emailRegex or validation before submission
